calculatePriceForTokenAmount(uint256,uin.details: Gets the prices for a specific amount of tokens: total and average

params.decimals: - how many decimal units the token has
params.msgSender: - who is the investor of this transaction
params.tokensSold: - how much tokens have been sold this far
params.value: - What is the value of the transaction send in as wei
params.weiRaised: - how much money has been raised this far in the main token sale - this number excludes presale

returns.tokenAmount: - Amount of tokens the investor receives

getCurrentPrice(uint256).details: Get the current unitPrice and feedPrice.

returns.unitPrice: == The current price or 0 if we are outside milestone period

getMilestone(uint256).details: Iterate through milestones. You reach end of milestones when price = 0

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateTokenAmount(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: When somebody tries to buy tokens for X eth, calculate how many tokens they get.

isSane().notice: Self check if all references are correctly set. Checks that pricing strategy matches crowdsale parameters.
